Key.Name: ContainerImageNames
Key.RemarksComment: This is the full image reference, as would be specified to "docker pull". An image will be sourced from the default Docker registry unless the image is fully qualified with an alternative registry.

Key.Name: ContainerRegistries
Key.SummaryComment: Additional private registries which containers can be pulled from.
Key.RemarksComment: If any images must be downloaded from a private registry which requires credentials, then those credentials must be provided here.
